sru:extraResponseData.fcs:transformedQuery: SELECT ndx.txt, base.entry, base.sid, COUNT(*) FROM aeb_eng_001__v001 AS base INNER JOIN (SELECT ndx.id, ndx.txt FROM (SELECT tab.id, tab.xpath, tab.txt FROM aeb_eng_001__v001_ndx AS tab INNER JOIN (SELECT inner.id FROM aeb_eng_001__v001_ndx AS `inner` WHERE inner.txt = 'released' AND inner.xpath LIKE '%-change-f-status-') AS prefid ON tab.id = prefid.id WHERE tab.txt != '-') AS ndx WHERE (ndx.txt = '1') AND ((ndx.xpath LIKE '%-bibl-%Course-'))) AS ndx ON base.id = ndx.id GROUP BY base.sid LIMIT 0, 200

cit.quote: "May your day be nice!"; answer to "Good Morning!"

cit.quote: May He (God) let you live.; May He give you a long life.
Er (Gott) lasse dich leben.; Er gebe dir ein langes Leben.
Qu’il (Dieu) te laisse vivre.; Qu’il te donne une longue vie.
May He (God) grant a long life for my son.
Er (Gott) lasse meinen Sohn lange leben.
Que Dieu donne une longue vie à mon fils.
